value:
There are so many talented clerics
here. I do hope they will allow me to
ask them questions from time to time.

I was the one who found Zeke
washed ashore, near death. Looking
back, it was almost like a fairy tale.

Don't let the little things get you
down. I can be clumsy, but I always
bounce back, and you can too!

I'm on my way to have tea with Zeke.
Would you care to join us? I baked a
cake for dessert!

*sigh* I made sweets, but they don't
taste quite right. I think I forgot to
add the sugar again...

I baked this bread for you on behalf
of $Nf.$k$pJust be careful not to break a
tooth on it...

I have truly amazing news: I baked
the perfect loaf of bread! It's soft
and everything!

I managed to avoid tripping, stubbing
a toe, or breaking anything, so I'll
call that a success!

Waaaah! Ouch... I think the ground
might be a bit uneven over here...

Your confidence in me has always
been a source of my strength. Thank
you for that.

Hello! I'm Tatiana. I can be somewhat
clumsy, but I'll do my best not to be
a burden!

Do you have time to chat,
$Nu? I made tea
for everyone, but...well...$k$pI forgot to steep the leaves and
ended up serving nothing but hot
water. I'm so embarrassed...$k$pEveryone laughed it off, but... I'm
always making mistakes. It's one
accident after another with me.$k$pI try to focus, but... Huh? You like
me the way I am? That sounds like
something Zeke would say.$k$pHe says it makes life interesting.
Well, if you feel the same way... Then
here's to more happy accidents!
えいっ
私だって！
きゃあっ
どうしよう…
Get away from me!
I will prevail!
Learn from this.
A just punishment!
Zeke... Please...
うふふっ
My name is Tatiana. I am a cleric, and I serve at an orphanage. Pleasure to meet you.
Eep! Zeke, we really mustn't... Wait, you're not Zeke! Oh, how mortifying!
Zeke had lost nearly all of his memory when I found him washed up on shore.
The brave warriors of the Deliverance rescued me from Nuibaba, the wicked woman who'd kidnapped me.
I'm so sorry... I meant to clean this vase, but I broke it in the process. Curse my clumsy hands...
Zeke... Promise you'll stay with me, no matter what memories of your past resurface...
Would you like some bread? It's fresh out of the oven! I haven't perfected the recipe yet, but I'll get there.
Consider it done.
Oh...right.
This way?
